description: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models: Almost all objects on the network should be contained within a Voltagelevel

contents.name: Name
contents.description: The name of the voltage level. For example, VL_01

contents.name: NominalVoltage
contents.description: The nominal voltage of the associated asset or resource. Either use this propoerty or BaseVoltage relationship to define nominal voltage

contents.name: BaseVoltage
contents.description: Relation to the associated BaseVoltage, the nominal voltage defined in base voltage resource will be used

contents.name: MemberOf_Substation
contents.description: Shows a relationship to a substation
